00023 b3QuantizedBvh::b3QuantizedBvh() : 
00024                                         m_bulletVersion(B3_BULLET_VERSION),
00025                                         m_useQuantization(false), 
00026                                         m_traversalMode(TRAVERSAL_STACKLESS_CACHE_FRIENDLY)
00027                                         //m_traversalMode(TRAVERSAL_STACKLESS)
00028                                         //m_traversalMode(TRAVERSAL_RECURSIVE)
00029                                         ,m_subtreeHeaderCount(0) //PCK: add this line
00030 {
00031         m_bvhAabbMin.setValue(-B3_INFINITY,-B3_INFINITY,-B3_INFINITY);
00032         m_bvhAabbMax.setValue(B3_INFINITY,B3_INFINITY,B3_INFINITY);
00033 }

00039 void b3QuantizedBvh::buildInternal()
00040 {
00042         m_useQuantization = true;
00043         int numLeafNodes = 0;
00044         
00045         if (m_useQuantization)
00046         {
00047                 //now we have an array of leafnodes in m_leafNodes
00048                 numLeafNodes = m_quantizedLeafNodes.size();
00049 
00050                 m_quantizedContiguousNodes.resize(2*numLeafNodes);
00051 
00052         }
00053 
00054         m_curNodeIndex = 0;
00055 
00056         buildTree(0,numLeafNodes);
00057 
00059         if(m_useQuantization && !m_SubtreeHeaders.size())
00060         {
00061                 b3BvhSubtreeInfo& subtree = m_SubtreeHeaders.expand();
00062                 subtree.setAabbFromQuantizeNode(m_quantizedContiguousNodes[0]);
00063                 subtree.m_rootNodeIndex = 0;
00064                 subtree.m_subtreeSize = m_quantizedContiguousNodes[0].isLeafNode() ? 1 : m_quantizedContiguousNodes[0].getEscapeIndex();
00065         }
00066 
00067         //PCK: update the copy of the size
00068         m_subtreeHeaderCount = m_SubtreeHeaders.size();
00069 
00070         //PCK: clear m_quantizedLeafNodes and m_leafNodes, they are temporary
00071         m_quantizedLeafNodes.clear();
00072         m_leafNodes.clear();
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 
00078 #ifdef DEBUG_PATCH_COLORS
00079 b3Vector3 color[4]=
00080 {
00081         b3Vector3(1,0,0),
00082         b3Vector3(0,1,0),
00083         b3Vector3(0,0,1),
00084         b3Vector3(0,1,1)
00085 };
00086 #endif //DEBUG_PATCH_COLORS

00090 void    b3QuantizedBvh::setQuantizationValues(const b3Vector3& bvhAabbMin,const b3Vector3& bvhAabbMax,b3Scalar quantizationMargin)
00091 {
00092         //enlarge the AABB to avoid division by zero when initializing the quantization values
00093         b3Vector3 clampValue =b3MakeVector3(quantizationMargin,quantizationMargin,quantizationMargin);
00094         m_bvhAabbMin = bvhAabbMin - clampValue;
00095         m_bvhAabbMax = bvhAabbMax + clampValue;
00096         b3Vector3 aabbSize = m_bvhAabbMax - m_bvhAabbMin;
00097         m_bvhQuantization = b3MakeVector3(b3Scalar(65533.0),b3Scalar(65533.0),b3Scalar(65533.0)) / aabbSize;
00098         m_useQuantization = true;
00099 }

00108 #ifdef DEBUG_TREE_BUILDING
00109 int gStackDepth = 0;
00110 int gMaxStackDepth = 0;
00111 #endif //DEBUG_TREE_BUILDING
00112 
00113 void    b3QuantizedBvh::buildTree       (int startIndex,int endIndex)
00114 {
00115 #ifdef DEBUG_TREE_BUILDING
00116         gStackDepth++;
00117         if (gStackDepth > gMaxStackDepth)
00118                 gMaxStackDepth = gStackDepth;
00119 #endif //DEBUG_TREE_BUILDING
00120 
00121 
00122         int splitAxis, splitIndex, i;
00123         int numIndices =endIndex-startIndex;
00124         int curIndex = m_curNodeIndex;
00125 
00126         b3Assert(numIndices>0);
00127 
00128         if (numIndices==1)
00129         {
00130 #ifdef DEBUG_TREE_BUILDING
00131                 gStackDepth--;
00132 #endif //DEBUG_TREE_BUILDING
00133                 
00134                 assignInternalNodeFromLeafNode(m_curNodeIndex,startIndex);
00135 
00136                 m_curNodeIndex++;
00137                 return; 
00138         }
00139         //calculate Best Splitting Axis and where to split it. Sort the incoming 'leafNodes' array within range 'startIndex/endIndex'.
00140         
00141         splitAxis = calcSplittingAxis(startIndex,endIndex);
00142 
00143         splitIndex = sortAndCalcSplittingIndex(startIndex,endIndex,splitAxis);
00144 
00145         int internalNodeIndex = m_curNodeIndex;
00146         
00147         //set the min aabb to 'inf' or a max value, and set the max aabb to a -inf/minimum value.
00148         //the aabb will be expanded during buildTree/mergeInternalNodeAabb with actual node values
00149         setInternalNodeAabbMin(m_curNodeIndex,m_bvhAabbMax);//can't use b3Vector3(B3_INFINITY,B3_INFINITY,B3_INFINITY)) because of quantization
00150         setInternalNodeAabbMax(m_curNodeIndex,m_bvhAabbMin);//can't use b3Vector3(-B3_INFINITY,-B3_INFINITY,-B3_INFINITY)) because of quantization
00151         
00152         
00153         for (i=startIndex;i<endIndex;i++)
00154         {
00155                 mergeInternalNodeAabb(m_curNodeIndex,getAabbMin(i),getAabbMax(i));
00156         }
00157 
00158         m_curNodeIndex++;
00159         
00160 
00161         //internalNode->m_escapeIndex;
00162         
00163         int leftChildNodexIndex = m_curNodeIndex;
00164 
00165         //build left child tree
00166         buildTree(startIndex,splitIndex);
00167 
00168         int rightChildNodexIndex = m_curNodeIndex;
00169         //build right child tree
00170         buildTree(splitIndex,endIndex);
00171 
00172 #ifdef DEBUG_TREE_BUILDING
00173         gStackDepth--;
00174 #endif //DEBUG_TREE_BUILDING
00175 
00176         int escapeIndex = m_curNodeIndex - curIndex;
00177 
00178         if (m_useQuantization)
00179         {
00180                 //escapeIndex is the number of nodes of this subtree
00181                 const int sizeQuantizedNode =sizeof(b3QuantizedBvhNode);
00182                 const int treeSizeInBytes = escapeIndex * sizeQuantizedNode;
00183                 if (treeSizeInBytes > MAX_SUBTREE_SIZE_IN_BYTES)
00184                 {
00185                         updateSubtreeHeaders(leftChildNodexIndex,rightChildNodexIndex);
00186                 }
00187         } else
00188         {
00189 
00190         }
00191 
00192         setInternalNodeEscapeIndex(internalNodeIndex,escapeIndex);
00193 
00194 }
00195 
00196 void    b3QuantizedBvh::updateSubtreeHeaders(int leftChildNodexIndex,int rightChildNodexIndex)
00197 {
00198         b3Assert(m_useQuantization);
00199 
00200         b3QuantizedBvhNode& leftChildNode = m_quantizedContiguousNodes[leftChildNodexIndex];
00201         int leftSubTreeSize = leftChildNode.isLeafNode() ? 1 : leftChildNode.getEscapeIndex();
00202         int leftSubTreeSizeInBytes =  leftSubTreeSize * static_cast<int>(sizeof(b3QuantizedBvhNode));
00203         
00204         b3QuantizedBvhNode& rightChildNode = m_quantizedContiguousNodes[rightChildNodexIndex];
00205         int rightSubTreeSize = rightChildNode.isLeafNode() ? 1 : rightChildNode.getEscapeIndex();
00206         int rightSubTreeSizeInBytes =  rightSubTreeSize *  static_cast<int>(sizeof(b3QuantizedBvhNode));
00207 
00208         if(leftSubTreeSizeInBytes <= MAX_SUBTREE_SIZE_IN_BYTES)
00209         {
00210                 b3BvhSubtreeInfo& subtree = m_SubtreeHeaders.expand();
00211                 subtree.setAabbFromQuantizeNode(leftChildNode);
00212                 subtree.m_rootNodeIndex = leftChildNodexIndex;
00213                 subtree.m_subtreeSize = leftSubTreeSize;
00214         }
00215 
00216         if(rightSubTreeSizeInBytes <= MAX_SUBTREE_SIZE_IN_BYTES)
00217         {
00218                 b3BvhSubtreeInfo& subtree = m_SubtreeHeaders.expand();
00219                 subtree.setAabbFromQuantizeNode(rightChildNode);
00220                 subtree.m_rootNodeIndex = rightChildNodexIndex;
00221                 subtree.m_subtreeSize = rightSubTreeSize;
00222         }
00223 
00224         //PCK: update the copy of the size
00225         m_subtreeHeaderCount = m_SubtreeHeaders.size();
00226 }
00227 
00228 
00229 int     b3QuantizedBvh::sortAndCalcSplittingIndex(int startIndex,int endIndex,int splitAxis)
00230 {
00231         int i;
00232         int splitIndex =startIndex;
00233         int numIndices = endIndex - startIndex;
00234         b3Scalar splitValue;
00235 
00236         b3Vector3 means=b3MakeVector3(b3Scalar(0.),b3Scalar(0.),b3Scalar(0.));
00237         for (i=startIndex;i<endIndex;i++)
00238         {
00239                 b3Vector3 center = b3Scalar(0.5)*(getAabbMax(i)+getAabbMin(i));
00240                 means+=center;
00241         }
00242         means *= (b3Scalar(1.)/(b3Scalar)numIndices);
00243         
00244         splitValue = means[splitAxis];
00245         
00246         //sort leafNodes so all values larger then splitValue comes first, and smaller values start from 'splitIndex'.
00247         for (i=startIndex;i<endIndex;i++)
00248         {
00249                 b3Vector3 center = b3Scalar(0.5)*(getAabbMax(i)+getAabbMin(i));
00250                 if (center[splitAxis] > splitValue)
00251                 {
00252                         //swap
00253                         swapLeafNodes(i,splitIndex);
00254                         splitIndex++;
00255                 }
00256         }
00257 
00258         //if the splitIndex causes unbalanced trees, fix this by using the center in between startIndex and endIndex
00259         //otherwise the tree-building might fail due to stack-overflows in certain cases.
00260         //unbalanced1 is unsafe: it can cause stack overflows
00261         //bool unbalanced1 = ((splitIndex==startIndex) || (splitIndex == (endIndex-1)));
00262 
00263         //unbalanced2 should work too: always use center (perfect balanced trees)       
00264         //bool unbalanced2 = true;
00265 
00266         //this should be safe too:
00267         int rangeBalancedIndices = numIndices/3;
00268         bool unbalanced = ((splitIndex<=(startIndex+rangeBalancedIndices)) || (splitIndex >=(endIndex-1-rangeBalancedIndices)));
00269         
00270         if (unbalanced)
00271         {
00272                 splitIndex = startIndex+ (numIndices>>1);
00273         }
00274 
00275         bool unbal = (splitIndex==startIndex) || (splitIndex == (endIndex));
00276         (void)unbal;
00277         b3Assert(!unbal);
00278 
00279         return splitIndex;
00280 }
00281 
00282 
00283 int     b3QuantizedBvh::calcSplittingAxis(int startIndex,int endIndex)
00284 {
00285         int i;
00286 
00287         b3Vector3 means=b3MakeVector3(b3Scalar(0.),b3Scalar(0.),b3Scalar(0.));
00288         b3Vector3 variance=b3MakeVector3(b3Scalar(0.),b3Scalar(0.),b3Scalar(0.));
00289         int numIndices = endIndex-startIndex;
00290 
00291         for (i=startIndex;i<endIndex;i++)
00292         {
00293                 b3Vector3 center = b3Scalar(0.5)*(getAabbMax(i)+getAabbMin(i));
00294                 means+=center;
00295         }
00296         means *= (b3Scalar(1.)/(b3Scalar)numIndices);
00297                 
00298         for (i=startIndex;i<endIndex;i++)
00299         {
00300                 b3Vector3 center = b3Scalar(0.5)*(getAabbMax(i)+getAabbMin(i));
00301                 b3Vector3 diff2 = center-means;
00302                 diff2 = diff2 * diff2;
00303                 variance += diff2;
00304         }
00305         variance *= (b3Scalar(1.)/      ((b3Scalar)numIndices-1)        );
00306         
00307         return variance.maxAxis();
00308 }

00311 
00312 void    b3QuantizedBvh::reportAabbOverlappingNodex(b3NodeOverlapCallback* nodeCallback,const b3Vector3& aabbMin,const b3Vector3& aabbMax) const
00313 {
00314         //either choose recursive traversal (walkTree) or stackless (walkStacklessTree)
00315 
00316         if (m_useQuantization)
00317         {
00319                 unsigned short int quantizedQueryAabbMin[3];
00320                 unsigned short int quantizedQueryAabbMax[3];
00321                 quantizeWithClamp(quantizedQueryAabbMin,aabbMin,0);
00322                 quantizeWithClamp(quantizedQueryAabbMax,aabbMax,1);
00323 
00324                 switch (m_traversalMode)
00325                 {
00326                 case TRAVERSAL_STACKLESS:
00327                                 walkStacklessQuantizedTree(nodeCallback,quantizedQueryAabbMin,quantizedQueryAabbMax,0,m_curNodeIndex);
00328                         break;
00329                 case TRAVERSAL_STACKLESS_CACHE_FRIENDLY:
00330                                 walkStacklessQuantizedTreeCacheFriendly(nodeCallback,quantizedQueryAabbMin,quantizedQueryAabbMax);
00331                         break;
00332                 case TRAVERSAL_RECURSIVE:
00333                         {
00334                                 const b3QuantizedBvhNode* rootNode = &m_quantizedContiguousNodes[0];
00335                                 walkRecursiveQuantizedTreeAgainstQueryAabb(rootNode,nodeCallback,quantizedQueryAabbMin,quantizedQueryAabbMax);
00336                         }
00337                         break;
00338                 default:
00339                         //unsupported
00340                         b3Assert(0);
00341                 }
00342         } else
00343         {
00344                 walkStacklessTree(nodeCallback,aabbMin,aabbMax);
00345         }
00346 }

00349 static int b3s_maxIterations = 0;
00350 
00351 
00352 void    b3QuantizedBvh::walkStacklessTree(b3NodeOverlapCallback* nodeCallback,const b3Vector3& aabbMin,const b3Vector3& aabbMax) const
00353 {
00354         b3Assert(!m_useQuantization);
00355 
00356         const b3OptimizedBvhNode* rootNode = &m_contiguousNodes[0];
00357         int escapeIndex, curIndex = 0;
00358         int walkIterations = 0;
00359         bool isLeafNode;
00360         //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00361         unsigned aabbOverlap;
00362 
00363         while (curIndex < m_curNodeIndex)
00364         {
00365                 //catch bugs in tree data
00366                 b3Assert (walkIterations < m_curNodeIndex);
00367 
00368                 walkIterations++;
00369                 aabbOverlap = b3TestAabbAgainstAabb2(aabbMin,aabbMax,rootNode->m_aabbMinOrg,rootNode->m_aabbMaxOrg);
00370                 isLeafNode = rootNode->m_escapeIndex == -1;
00371                 
00372                 //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00373                 if (isLeafNode && (aabbOverlap != 0))
00374                 {
00375                         nodeCallback->processNode(rootNode->m_subPart,rootNode->m_triangleIndex);
00376                 } 
00377                 
00378                 //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00379                 if ((aabbOverlap != 0) || isLeafNode)
00380                 {
00381                         rootNode++;
00382                         curIndex++;
00383                 } else
00384                 {
00385                         escapeIndex = rootNode->m_escapeIndex;
00386                         rootNode += escapeIndex;
00387                         curIndex += escapeIndex;
00388                 }
00389         }
00390         if (b3s_maxIterations < walkIterations)
00391                 b3s_maxIterations = walkIterations;
00392 
00393 }

00395 /*
00397 void    b3QuantizedBvh::walkTree(b3OptimizedBvhNode* rootNode,b3NodeOverlapCallback* nodeCallback,const b3Vector3& aabbMin,const b3Vector3& aabbMax) const
00398 {
00399         bool isLeafNode, aabbOverlap = TestAabbAgainstAabb2(aabbMin,aabbMax,rootNode->m_aabbMin,rootNode->m_aabbMax);
00400         if (aabbOverlap)
00401         {
00402                 isLeafNode = (!rootNode->m_leftChild && !rootNode->m_rightChild);
00403                 if (isLeafNode)
00404                 {
00405                         nodeCallback->processNode(rootNode);
00406                 } else
00407                 {
00408                         walkTree(rootNode->m_leftChild,nodeCallback,aabbMin,aabbMax);
00409                         walkTree(rootNode->m_rightChild,nodeCallback,aabbMin,aabbMax);
00410                 }
00411         }
00412 
00413 }
00414 */
00415 
00416 void b3QuantizedBvh::walkRecursiveQuantizedTreeAgainstQueryAabb(const b3QuantizedBvhNode* currentNode,b3NodeOverlapCallback* nodeCallback,unsigned short int* quantizedQueryAabbMin,unsigned short int* quantizedQueryAabbMax) const
00417 {
00418         b3Assert(m_useQuantization);
00419         
00420         bool isLeafNode;
00421         //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00422         unsigned aabbOverlap;
00423 
00424         //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00425         aabbOverlap = b3TestQuantizedAabbAgainstQuantizedAabb(quantizedQueryAabbMin,quantizedQueryAabbMax,currentNode->m_quantizedAabbMin,currentNode->m_quantizedAabbMax);
00426         isLeafNode = currentNode->isLeafNode();
00427                 
00428         //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00429         if (aabbOverlap != 0)
00430         {
00431                 if (isLeafNode)
00432                 {
00433                         nodeCallback->processNode(currentNode->getPartId(),currentNode->getTriangleIndex());
00434                 } else
00435                 {
00436                         //process left and right children
00437                         const b3QuantizedBvhNode* leftChildNode = currentNode+1;
00438                         walkRecursiveQuantizedTreeAgainstQueryAabb(leftChildNode,nodeCallback,quantizedQueryAabbMin,quantizedQueryAabbMax);
00439 
00440                         const b3QuantizedBvhNode* rightChildNode = leftChildNode->isLeafNode() ? leftChildNode+1:leftChildNode+leftChildNode->getEscapeIndex();
00441                         walkRecursiveQuantizedTreeAgainstQueryAabb(rightChildNode,nodeCallback,quantizedQueryAabbMin,quantizedQueryAabbMax);
00442                 }
00443         }               
00444 }

00448 void    b3QuantizedBvh::walkStacklessTreeAgainstRay(b3NodeOverlapCallback* nodeCallback, const b3Vector3& raySource, const b3Vector3& rayTarget, const b3Vector3& aabbMin, const b3Vector3& aabbMax, int startNodeIndex,int endNodeIndex) const
00449 {
00450         b3Assert(!m_useQuantization);
00451 
00452         const b3OptimizedBvhNode* rootNode = &m_contiguousNodes[0];
00453         int escapeIndex, curIndex = 0;
00454         int walkIterations = 0;
00455         bool isLeafNode;
00456         //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00457         unsigned aabbOverlap=0;
00458         unsigned rayBoxOverlap=0;
00459         b3Scalar lambda_max = 1.0;
00460         
00461                 /* Quick pruning by quantized box */
00462         b3Vector3 rayAabbMin = raySource;
00463         b3Vector3 rayAabbMax = raySource;
00464         rayAabbMin.setMin(rayTarget);
00465         rayAabbMax.setMax(rayTarget);
00466 
00467         /* Add box cast extents to bounding box */
00468         rayAabbMin += aabbMin;
00469         rayAabbMax += aabbMax;
00470 
00471 #ifdef RAYAABB2
00472         b3Vector3 rayDir = (rayTarget-raySource);
00473         rayDir.normalize ();
00474         lambda_max = rayDir.dot(rayTarget-raySource);
00476         b3Vector3 rayDirectionInverse;
00477         rayDirectionInverse[0] = rayDir[0] == b3Scalar(0.0) ? b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT) : b3Scalar(1.0) / rayDir[0];
00478         rayDirectionInverse[1] = rayDir[1] == b3Scalar(0.0) ? b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT) : b3Scalar(1.0) / rayDir[1];
00479         rayDirectionInverse[2] = rayDir[2] == b3Scalar(0.0) ? b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT) : b3Scalar(1.0) / rayDir[2];
00480         unsigned int sign[3] = { rayDirectionInverse[0] < 0.0, rayDirectionInverse[1] < 0.0, rayDirectionInverse[2] < 0.0};
00481 #endif
00482 
00483         b3Vector3 bounds[2];
00484 
00485         while (curIndex < m_curNodeIndex)
00486         {
00487                 b3Scalar param = 1.0;
00488                 //catch bugs in tree data
00489                 b3Assert (walkIterations < m_curNodeIndex);
00490 
00491                 walkIterations++;
00492 
00493                 bounds[0] = rootNode->m_aabbMinOrg;
00494                 bounds[1] = rootNode->m_aabbMaxOrg;
00495                 /* Add box cast extents */
00496                 bounds[0] -= aabbMax;
00497                 bounds[1] -= aabbMin;
00498 
00499                 aabbOverlap = b3TestAabbAgainstAabb2(rayAabbMin,rayAabbMax,rootNode->m_aabbMinOrg,rootNode->m_aabbMaxOrg);
00500                 //perhaps profile if it is worth doing the aabbOverlap test first
00501 
00502 #ifdef RAYAABB2
00506                 rayBoxOverlap = aabbOverlap ? b3RayAabb2 (raySource, rayDirectionInverse, sign, bounds, param, 0.0f, lambda_max) : false;
00507 
00508 #else
00509                 b3Vector3 normal;
00510                 rayBoxOverlap = b3RayAabb(raySource, rayTarget,bounds[0],bounds[1],param, normal);
00511 #endif
00512 
00513                 isLeafNode = rootNode->m_escapeIndex == -1;
00514                 
00515                 //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00516                 if (isLeafNode && (rayBoxOverlap != 0))
00517                 {
00518                         nodeCallback->processNode(rootNode->m_subPart,rootNode->m_triangleIndex);
00519                 } 
00520                 
00521                 //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00522                 if ((rayBoxOverlap != 0) || isLeafNode)
00523                 {
00524                         rootNode++;
00525                         curIndex++;
00526                 } else
00527                 {
00528                         escapeIndex = rootNode->m_escapeIndex;
00529                         rootNode += escapeIndex;
00530                         curIndex += escapeIndex;
00531                 }
00532         }
00533         if (b3s_maxIterations < walkIterations)
00534                 b3s_maxIterations = walkIterations;
00535 
00536 }

00538 
00539 
00540 void    b3QuantizedBvh::walkStacklessQuantizedTreeAgainstRay(b3NodeOverlapCallback* nodeCallback, const b3Vector3& raySource, const b3Vector3& rayTarget, const b3Vector3& aabbMin, const b3Vector3& aabbMax, int startNodeIndex,int endNodeIndex) const
00541 {
00542         b3Assert(m_useQuantization);
00543         
00544         int curIndex = startNodeIndex;
00545         int walkIterations = 0;
00546         int subTreeSize = endNodeIndex - startNodeIndex;
00547         (void)subTreeSize;
00548 
00549         const b3QuantizedBvhNode* rootNode = &m_quantizedContiguousNodes[startNodeIndex];
00550         int escapeIndex;
00551         
00552         bool isLeafNode;
00553         //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00554         unsigned boxBoxOverlap = 0;
00555         unsigned rayBoxOverlap = 0;
00556 
00557         b3Scalar lambda_max = 1.0;
00558 
00559 #ifdef RAYAABB2
00560         b3Vector3 rayDirection = (rayTarget-raySource);
00561         rayDirection.normalize ();
00562         lambda_max = rayDirection.dot(rayTarget-raySource);
00564         rayDirection[0] = rayDirection[0] == b3Scalar(0.0) ? b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT) : b3Scalar(1.0) / rayDirection[0];
00565         rayDirection[1] = rayDirection[1] == b3Scalar(0.0) ? b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT) : b3Scalar(1.0) / rayDirection[1];
00566         rayDirection[2] = rayDirection[2] == b3Scalar(0.0) ? b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT) : b3Scalar(1.0) / rayDirection[2];
00567         unsigned int sign[3] = { rayDirection[0] < 0.0, rayDirection[1] < 0.0, rayDirection[2] < 0.0};
00568 #endif
00569 
00570         /* Quick pruning by quantized box */
00571         b3Vector3 rayAabbMin = raySource;
00572         b3Vector3 rayAabbMax = raySource;
00573         rayAabbMin.setMin(rayTarget);
00574         rayAabbMax.setMax(rayTarget);
00575 
00576         /* Add box cast extents to bounding box */
00577         rayAabbMin += aabbMin;
00578         rayAabbMax += aabbMax;
00579 
00580         unsigned short int quantizedQueryAabbMin[3];
00581         unsigned short int quantizedQueryAabbMax[3];
00582         quantizeWithClamp(quantizedQueryAabbMin,rayAabbMin,0);
00583         quantizeWithClamp(quantizedQueryAabbMax,rayAabbMax,1);
00584 
00585         while (curIndex < endNodeIndex)
00586         {
00587 
00588 //#define VISUALLY_ANALYZE_BVH 1
00589 #ifdef VISUALLY_ANALYZE_BVH
00590                 //some code snippet to debugDraw aabb, to visually analyze bvh structure
00591                 static int drawPatch = 0;
00592                 //need some global access to a debugDrawer
00593                 extern b3IDebugDraw* debugDrawerPtr;
00594                 if (curIndex==drawPatch)
00595                 {
00596                         b3Vector3 aabbMin,aabbMax;
00597                         aabbMin = unQuantize(rootNode->m_quantizedAabbMin);
00598                         aabbMax = unQuantize(rootNode->m_quantizedAabbMax);
00599                         b3Vector3       color(1,0,0);
00600                         debugDrawerPtr->drawAabb(aabbMin,aabbMax,color);
00601                 }
00602 #endif//VISUALLY_ANALYZE_BVH
00603 
00604                 //catch bugs in tree data
00605                 b3Assert (walkIterations < subTreeSize);
00606 
00607                 walkIterations++;
00608                 //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00609                 // only interested if this is closer than any previous hit
00610                 b3Scalar param = 1.0;
00611                 rayBoxOverlap = 0;
00612                 boxBoxOverlap = b3TestQuantizedAabbAgainstQuantizedAabb(quantizedQueryAabbMin,quantizedQueryAabbMax,rootNode->m_quantizedAabbMin,rootNode->m_quantizedAabbMax);
00613                 isLeafNode = rootNode->isLeafNode();
00614                 if (boxBoxOverlap)
00615                 {
00616                         b3Vector3 bounds[2];
00617                         bounds[0] = unQuantize(rootNode->m_quantizedAabbMin);
00618                         bounds[1] = unQuantize(rootNode->m_quantizedAabbMax);
00619                         /* Add box cast extents */
00620                         bounds[0] -= aabbMax;
00621                         bounds[1] -= aabbMin;
00622 #if 0
00623                         b3Vector3 normal;
00624                         bool ra2 = b3RayAabb2 (raySource, rayDirection, sign, bounds, param, 0.0, lambda_max);
00625                         bool ra = b3RayAabb (raySource, rayTarget, bounds[0], bounds[1], param, normal);
00626                         if (ra2 != ra)
00627                         {
00628                                 printf("functions don't match\n");
00629                         }
00630 #endif
00631 #ifdef RAYAABB2
00635 
00636                         //B3_PROFILE("b3RayAabb2");
00637                         rayBoxOverlap = b3RayAabb2 (raySource, rayDirection, sign, bounds, param, 0.0f, lambda_max);
00638                         
00639 #else
00640                         rayBoxOverlap = true;//b3RayAabb(raySource, rayTarget, bounds[0], bounds[1], param, normal);
00641 #endif
00642                 }
00643                 
00644                 if (isLeafNode && rayBoxOverlap)
00645                 {
00646                         nodeCallback->processNode(rootNode->getPartId(),rootNode->getTriangleIndex());
00647                 }
00648                 
00649                 //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00650                 if ((rayBoxOverlap != 0) || isLeafNode)
00651                 {
00652                         rootNode++;
00653                         curIndex++;
00654                 } else
00655                 {
00656                         escapeIndex = rootNode->getEscapeIndex();
00657                         rootNode += escapeIndex;
00658                         curIndex += escapeIndex;
00659                 }
00660         }
00661         if (b3s_maxIterations < walkIterations)
00662                 b3s_maxIterations = walkIterations;
00663 
00664 }
00665 
00666 void    b3QuantizedBvh::walkStacklessQuantizedTree(b3NodeOverlapCallback* nodeCallback,unsigned short int* quantizedQueryAabbMin,unsigned short int* quantizedQueryAabbMax,int startNodeIndex,int endNodeIndex) const
00667 {
00668         b3Assert(m_useQuantization);
00669         
00670         int curIndex = startNodeIndex;
00671         int walkIterations = 0;
00672         int subTreeSize = endNodeIndex - startNodeIndex;
00673         (void)subTreeSize;
00674 
00675         const b3QuantizedBvhNode* rootNode = &m_quantizedContiguousNodes[startNodeIndex];
00676         int escapeIndex;
00677         
00678         bool isLeafNode;
00679         //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00680         unsigned aabbOverlap;
00681 
00682         while (curIndex < endNodeIndex)
00683         {
00684 
00685 //#define VISUALLY_ANALYZE_BVH 1
00686 #ifdef VISUALLY_ANALYZE_BVH
00687                 //some code snippet to debugDraw aabb, to visually analyze bvh structure
00688                 static int drawPatch = 0;
00689                 //need some global access to a debugDrawer
00690                 extern b3IDebugDraw* debugDrawerPtr;
00691                 if (curIndex==drawPatch)
00692                 {
00693                         b3Vector3 aabbMin,aabbMax;
00694                         aabbMin = unQuantize(rootNode->m_quantizedAabbMin);
00695                         aabbMax = unQuantize(rootNode->m_quantizedAabbMax);
00696                         b3Vector3       color(1,0,0);
00697                         debugDrawerPtr->drawAabb(aabbMin,aabbMax,color);
00698                 }
00699 #endif//VISUALLY_ANALYZE_BVH
00700 
00701                 //catch bugs in tree data
00702                 b3Assert (walkIterations < subTreeSize);
00703 
00704                 walkIterations++;
00705                 //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00706                 aabbOverlap = b3TestQuantizedAabbAgainstQuantizedAabb(quantizedQueryAabbMin,quantizedQueryAabbMax,rootNode->m_quantizedAabbMin,rootNode->m_quantizedAabbMax);
00707                 isLeafNode = rootNode->isLeafNode();
00708                 
00709                 if (isLeafNode && aabbOverlap)
00710                 {
00711                         nodeCallback->processNode(rootNode->getPartId(),rootNode->getTriangleIndex());
00712                 } 
00713                 
00714                 //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00715                 if ((aabbOverlap != 0) || isLeafNode)
00716                 {
00717                         rootNode++;
00718                         curIndex++;
00719                 } else
00720                 {
00721                         escapeIndex = rootNode->getEscapeIndex();
00722                         rootNode += escapeIndex;
00723                         curIndex += escapeIndex;
00724                 }
00725         }
00726         if (b3s_maxIterations < walkIterations)
00727                 b3s_maxIterations = walkIterations;
00728 
00729 }
00730 
00731 //This traversal can be called from Playstation 3 SPU
00732 void    b3QuantizedBvh::walkStacklessQuantizedTreeCacheFriendly(b3NodeOverlapCallback* nodeCallback,unsigned short int* quantizedQueryAabbMin,unsigned short int* quantizedQueryAabbMax) const
00733 {
00734         b3Assert(m_useQuantization);
00735 
00736         int i;
00737 
00738 
00739         for (i=0;i<this->m_SubtreeHeaders.size();i++)
00740         {
00741                 const b3BvhSubtreeInfo& subtree = m_SubtreeHeaders[i];
00742 
00743                 //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00744                 unsigned overlap = b3TestQuantizedAabbAgainstQuantizedAabb(quantizedQueryAabbMin,quantizedQueryAabbMax,subtree.m_quantizedAabbMin,subtree.m_quantizedAabbMax);
00745                 if (overlap != 0)
00746                 {
00747                         walkStacklessQuantizedTree(nodeCallback,quantizedQueryAabbMin,quantizedQueryAabbMax,
00748                                 subtree.m_rootNodeIndex,
00749                                 subtree.m_rootNodeIndex+subtree.m_subtreeSize);
00750                 }
00751         }
00752 }

00755 void    b3QuantizedBvh::reportRayOverlappingNodex (b3NodeOverlapCallback* nodeCallback, const b3Vector3& raySource, const b3Vector3& rayTarget) const
00756 {
00757         reportBoxCastOverlappingNodex(nodeCallback,raySource,rayTarget,b3MakeVector3(0,0,0),b3MakeVector3(0,0,0));
00758 }
00759 
00760 
00761 void    b3QuantizedBvh::reportBoxCastOverlappingNodex(b3NodeOverlapCallback* nodeCallback, const b3Vector3& raySource, const b3Vector3& rayTarget, const b3Vector3& aabbMin,const b3Vector3& aabbMax) const
00762 {
00763         //always use stackless
00764 
00765         if (m_useQuantization)
00766         {
00767                 walkStacklessQuantizedTreeAgainstRay(nodeCallback, raySource, rayTarget, aabbMin, aabbMax, 0, m_curNodeIndex);
00768         }
00769         else
00770         {
00771                 walkStacklessTreeAgainstRay(nodeCallback, raySource, rayTarget, aabbMin, aabbMax, 0, m_curNodeIndex);
00772         }
00773         /*
00774         {
00775                 //recursive traversal
00776                 b3Vector3 qaabbMin = raySource;
00777                 b3Vector3 qaabbMax = raySource;
00778                 qaabbMin.setMin(rayTarget);
00779                 qaabbMax.setMax(rayTarget);
00780                 qaabbMin += aabbMin;
00781                 qaabbMax += aabbMax;
00782                 reportAabbOverlappingNodex(nodeCallback,qaabbMin,qaabbMax);
00783         }
00784         */
00785 
00786 }

00788 
00789 void    b3QuantizedBvh::swapLeafNodes(int i,int splitIndex)
00790 {
00791         if (m_useQuantization)
00792         {
00793                         b3QuantizedBvhNode tmp = m_quantizedLeafNodes[i];
00794                         m_quantizedLeafNodes[i] = m_quantizedLeafNodes[splitIndex];
00795                         m_quantizedLeafNodes[splitIndex] = tmp;
00796         } else
00797         {
00798                         b3OptimizedBvhNode tmp = m_leafNodes[i];
00799                         m_leafNodes[i] = m_leafNodes[splitIndex];
00800                         m_leafNodes[splitIndex] = tmp;
00801         }
00802 }
00803 
00804 void    b3QuantizedBvh::assignInternalNodeFromLeafNode(int internalNode,int leafNodeIndex)
00805 {
00806         if (m_useQuantization)
00807         {
00808                 m_quantizedContiguousNodes[internalNode] = m_quantizedLeafNodes[leafNodeIndex];
00809         } else
00810         {
00811                 m_contiguousNodes[internalNode] = m_leafNodes[leafNodeIndex];
00812         }
00813 }
00814 
00815 //PCK: include
00816 #include <new>
00817 
00818 #if 0
00819 //PCK: consts
00820 static const unsigned BVH_ALIGNMENT = 16;
00821 static const unsigned BVH_ALIGNMENT_MASK = BVH_ALIGNMENT-1;
00822 
00823 static const unsigned BVH_ALIGNMENT_BLOCKS = 2;
00824 #endif
00825 
00826 
00827 unsigned int b3QuantizedBvh::getAlignmentSerializationPadding()
00828 {
00829         // I changed this to 0 since the extra padding is not needed or used.
00830         return 0;//BVH_ALIGNMENT_BLOCKS * BVH_ALIGNMENT;
00831 }
00832 
00833 unsigned b3QuantizedBvh::calculateSerializeBufferSize() const
00834 {
00835         unsigned baseSize = sizeof(b3QuantizedBvh) + getAlignmentSerializationPadding();
00836         baseSize += sizeof(b3BvhSubtreeInfo) * m_subtreeHeaderCount;
00837         if (m_useQuantization)
00838         {
00839                 return baseSize + m_curNodeIndex * sizeof(b3QuantizedBvhNode);
00840         }
00841         return baseSize + m_curNodeIndex * sizeof(b3OptimizedBvhNode);
00842 }
00843 
00844 bool b3QuantizedBvh::serialize(void *o_alignedDataBuffer, unsigned /*i_dataBufferSize */, bool i_swapEndian) const
00845 {
00846         b3Assert(m_subtreeHeaderCount == m_SubtreeHeaders.size());
00847         m_subtreeHeaderCount = m_SubtreeHeaders.size();
00848 
00849 /*      if (i_dataBufferSize < calculateSerializeBufferSize() || o_alignedDataBuffer == NULL || (((unsigned)o_alignedDataBuffer & BVH_ALIGNMENT_MASK) != 0))
00850         {
00852                 b3Assert(0);
00853                 return false;
00854         }
00855 */
00856 
00857         b3QuantizedBvh *targetBvh = (b3QuantizedBvh *)o_alignedDataBuffer;
00858 
00859         // construct the class so the virtual function table, etc will be set up
00860         // Also, m_leafNodes and m_quantizedLeafNodes will be initialized to default values by the constructor
00861         new (targetBvh) b3QuantizedBvh;
00862 
00863         if (i_swapEndian)
00864         {
00865                 targetBvh->m_curNodeIndex = static_cast<int>(b3SwapEndian(m_curNodeIndex));
00866 
00867 
00868                 b3SwapVector3Endian(m_bvhAabbMin,targetBvh->m_bvhAabbMin);
00869                 b3SwapVector3Endian(m_bvhAabbMax,targetBvh->m_bvhAabbMax);
00870                 b3SwapVector3Endian(m_bvhQuantization,targetBvh->m_bvhQuantization);
00871 
00872                 targetBvh->m_traversalMode = (b3TraversalMode)b3SwapEndian(m_traversalMode);
00873                 targetBvh->m_subtreeHeaderCount = static_cast<int>(b3SwapEndian(m_subtreeHeaderCount));
00874         }
00875         else
00876         {
00877                 targetBvh->m_curNodeIndex = m_curNodeIndex;
00878                 targetBvh->m_bvhAabbMin = m_bvhAabbMin;
00879                 targetBvh->m_bvhAabbMax = m_bvhAabbMax;
00880                 targetBvh->m_bvhQuantization = m_bvhQuantization;
00881                 targetBvh->m_traversalMode = m_traversalMode;
00882                 targetBvh->m_subtreeHeaderCount = m_subtreeHeaderCount;
00883         }
00884 
00885         targetBvh->m_useQuantization = m_useQuantization;
00886 
00887         unsigned char *nodeData = (unsigned char *)targetBvh;
00888         nodeData += sizeof(b3QuantizedBvh);
00889         
00890         unsigned sizeToAdd = 0;//(BVH_ALIGNMENT-((unsigned)nodeData & BVH_ALIGNMENT_MASK))&BVH_ALIGNMENT_MASK;
00891         nodeData += sizeToAdd;
00892         
00893         int nodeCount = m_curNodeIndex;
00894 
00895         if (m_useQuantization)
00896         {
00897                 targetBvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes.initializeFromBuffer(nodeData, nodeCount, nodeCount);
00898 
00899                 if (i_swapEndian)
00900                 {
00901                         for (int nodeIndex = 0; nodeIndex < nodeCount; nodeIndex++)
00902                         {
00903                                 targetBvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[0] = b3SwapEndian(m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[0]);
00904                                 targetBvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[1] = b3SwapEndian(m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[1]);
00905                                 targetBvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[2] = b3SwapEndian(m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[2]);
00906 
00907                                 targetBvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[0] = b3SwapEndian(m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[0]);
00908                                 targetBvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[1] = b3SwapEndian(m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[1]);
00909                                 targetBvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[2] = b3SwapEndian(m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[2]);
00910 
00911                                 targetBvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_escapeIndexOrTriangleIndex = static_cast<int>(b3SwapEndian(m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_escapeIndexOrTriangleIndex));
00912                         }
00913                 }
00914                 else
00915                 {
00916                         for (int nodeIndex = 0; nodeIndex < nodeCount; nodeIndex++)
00917                         {
00918         
00919                                 targetBvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[0] = m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[0];
00920                                 targetBvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[1] = m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[1];
00921                                 targetBvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[2] = m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[2];
00922 
00923                                 targetBvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[0] = m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[0];
00924                                 targetBvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[1] = m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[1];
00925                                 targetBvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[2] = m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[2];
00926 
00927                                 targetBvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_escapeIndexOrTriangleIndex = m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_escapeIndexOrTriangleIndex;
00928 
00929 
00930                         }
00931                 }
00932                 nodeData += sizeof(b3QuantizedBvhNode) * nodeCount;
00933 
00934                 // this clears the pointer in the member variable it doesn't really do anything to the data
00935                 // it does call the destructor on the contained objects, but they are all classes with no destructor defined
00936                 // so the memory (which is not freed) is left alone
00937                 targetBvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes.initializeFromBuffer(NULL, 0, 0);
00938         }
00939         else
00940         {
00941                 targetBvh->m_contiguousNodes.initializeFromBuffer(nodeData, nodeCount, nodeCount);
00942 
00943                 if (i_swapEndian)
00944                 {
00945                         for (int nodeIndex = 0; nodeIndex < nodeCount; nodeIndex++)
00946                         {
00947                                 b3SwapVector3Endian(m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_aabbMinOrg, targetBvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_aabbMinOrg);
00948                                 b3SwapVector3Endian(m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_aabbMaxOrg, targetBvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_aabbMaxOrg);
00949 
00950                                 targetBvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_escapeIndex = static_cast<int>(b3SwapEndian(m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_escapeIndex));
00951                                 targetBvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_subPart = static_cast<int>(b3SwapEndian(m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_subPart));
00952                                 targetBvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_triangleIndex = static_cast<int>(b3SwapEndian(m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_triangleIndex));
00953                         }
00954                 }
00955                 else
00956                 {
00957                         for (int nodeIndex = 0; nodeIndex < nodeCount; nodeIndex++)
00958                         {
00959                                 targetBvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_aabbMinOrg = m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_aabbMinOrg;
00960                                 targetBvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_aabbMaxOrg = m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_aabbMaxOrg;
00961 
00962                                 targetBvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_escapeIndex = m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_escapeIndex;
00963                                 targetBvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_subPart = m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_subPart;
00964                                 targetBvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_triangleIndex = m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_triangleIndex;
00965                         }
00966                 }
00967                 nodeData += sizeof(b3OptimizedBvhNode) * nodeCount;
00968 
00969                 // this clears the pointer in the member variable it doesn't really do anything to the data
00970                 // it does call the destructor on the contained objects, but they are all classes with no destructor defined
00971                 // so the memory (which is not freed) is left alone
00972                 targetBvh->m_contiguousNodes.initializeFromBuffer(NULL, 0, 0);
00973         }
00974 
00975         sizeToAdd = 0;//(BVH_ALIGNMENT-((unsigned)nodeData & BVH_ALIGNMENT_MASK))&BVH_ALIGNMENT_MASK;
00976         nodeData += sizeToAdd;
00977 
00978         // Now serialize the subtree headers
00979         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders.initializeFromBuffer(nodeData, m_subtreeHeaderCount, m_subtreeHeaderCount);
00980         if (i_swapEndian)
00981         {
00982                 for (int i = 0; i < m_subtreeHeaderCount; i++)
00983                 {
00984                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[0] = b3SwapEndian(m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[0]);
00985                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[1] = b3SwapEndian(m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[1]);
00986                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[2] = b3SwapEndian(m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[2]);
00987 
00988                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[0] = b3SwapEndian(m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[0]);
00989                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[1] = b3SwapEndian(m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[1]);
00990                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[2] = b3SwapEndian(m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[2]);
00991 
00992                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_rootNodeIndex = static_cast<int>(b3SwapEndian(m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_rootNodeIndex));
00993                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_subtreeSize = static_cast<int>(b3SwapEndian(m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_subtreeSize));
00994                 }
00995         }
00996         else
00997         {
00998                 for (int i = 0; i < m_subtreeHeaderCount; i++)
00999                 {
01000                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[0] = (m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[0]);
01001                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[1] = (m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[1]);
01002                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[2] = (m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[2]);
01003 
01004                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[0] = (m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[0]);
01005                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[1] = (m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[1]);
01006                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[2] = (m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[2]);
01007 
01008                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_rootNodeIndex = (m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_rootNodeIndex);
01009                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_subtreeSize = (m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_subtreeSize);
01010 
01011                         // need to clear padding in destination buffer
01012                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_padding[0] = 0;
01013                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_padding[1] = 0;
01014                         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_padding[2] = 0;
01015                 }
01016         }
01017         nodeData += sizeof(b3BvhSubtreeInfo) * m_subtreeHeaderCount;
01018 
01019         // this clears the pointer in the member variable it doesn't really do anything to the data
01020         // it does call the destructor on the contained objects, but they are all classes with no destructor defined
01021         // so the memory (which is not freed) is left alone
01022         targetBvh->m_SubtreeHeaders.initializeFromBuffer(NULL, 0, 0);
01023 
01024         // this wipes the virtual function table pointer at the start of the buffer for the class
01025         *((void**)o_alignedDataBuffer) = NULL;
01026 
01027         return true;
01028 }
01029 
01030 b3QuantizedBvh *b3QuantizedBvh::deSerializeInPlace(void *i_alignedDataBuffer, unsigned int i_dataBufferSize, bool i_swapEndian)
01031 {
01032 
01033         if (i_alignedDataBuffer == NULL)// || (((unsigned)i_alignedDataBuffer & BVH_ALIGNMENT_MASK) != 0))
01034         {
01035                 return NULL;
01036         }
01037         b3QuantizedBvh *bvh = (b3QuantizedBvh *)i_alignedDataBuffer;
01038 
01039         if (i_swapEndian)
01040         {
01041                 bvh->m_curNodeIndex = static_cast<int>(b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_curNodeIndex));
01042 
01043                 b3UnSwapVector3Endian(bvh->m_bvhAabbMin);
01044                 b3UnSwapVector3Endian(bvh->m_bvhAabbMax);
01045                 b3UnSwapVector3Endian(bvh->m_bvhQuantization);
01046 
01047                 bvh->m_traversalMode = (b3TraversalMode)b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_traversalMode);
01048                 bvh->m_subtreeHeaderCount = static_cast<int>(b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_subtreeHeaderCount));
01049         }
01050 
01051         unsigned int calculatedBufSize = bvh->calculateSerializeBufferSize();
01052         b3Assert(calculatedBufSize <= i_dataBufferSize);
01053 
01054         if (calculatedBufSize > i_dataBufferSize)
01055         {
01056                 return NULL;
01057         }
01058 
01059         unsigned char *nodeData = (unsigned char *)bvh;
01060         nodeData += sizeof(b3QuantizedBvh);
01061         
01062         unsigned sizeToAdd = 0;//(BVH_ALIGNMENT-((unsigned)nodeData & BVH_ALIGNMENT_MASK))&BVH_ALIGNMENT_MASK;
01063         nodeData += sizeToAdd;
01064         
01065         int nodeCount = bvh->m_curNodeIndex;
01066 
01067         // Must call placement new to fill in virtual function table, etc, but we don't want to overwrite most data, so call a special version of the constructor
01068         // Also, m_leafNodes and m_quantizedLeafNodes will be initialized to default values by the constructor
01069         new (bvh) b3QuantizedBvh(*bvh, false);
01070 
01071         if (bvh->m_useQuantization)
01072         {
01073                 bvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes.initializeFromBuffer(nodeData, nodeCount, nodeCount);
01074 
01075                 if (i_swapEndian)
01076                 {
01077                         for (int nodeIndex = 0; nodeIndex < nodeCount; nodeIndex++)
01078                         {
01079                                 bvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[0] = b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[0]);
01080                                 bvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[1] = b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[1]);
01081                                 bvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[2] = b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMin[2]);
01082 
01083                                 bvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[0] = b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[0]);
01084                                 bvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[1] = b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[1]);
01085                                 bvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[2] = b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_quantizedAabbMax[2]);
01086 
01087                                 bvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_escapeIndexOrTriangleIndex = static_cast<int>(b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_quantizedContiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_escapeIndexOrTriangleIndex));
01088                         }
01089                 }
01090                 nodeData += sizeof(b3QuantizedBvhNode) * nodeCount;
01091         }
01092         else
01093         {
01094                 bvh->m_contiguousNodes.initializeFromBuffer(nodeData, nodeCount, nodeCount);
01095 
01096                 if (i_swapEndian)
01097                 {
01098                         for (int nodeIndex = 0; nodeIndex < nodeCount; nodeIndex++)
01099                         {
01100                                 b3UnSwapVector3Endian(bvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_aabbMinOrg);
01101                                 b3UnSwapVector3Endian(bvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_aabbMaxOrg);
01102                                 
01103                                 bvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_escapeIndex = static_cast<int>(b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_escapeIndex));
01104                                 bvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_subPart = static_cast<int>(b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_subPart));
01105                                 bvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_triangleIndex = static_cast<int>(b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_contiguousNodes[nodeIndex].m_triangleIndex));
01106                         }
01107                 }
01108                 nodeData += sizeof(b3OptimizedBvhNode) * nodeCount;
01109         }
01110 
01111         sizeToAdd = 0;//(BVH_ALIGNMENT-((unsigned)nodeData & BVH_ALIGNMENT_MASK))&BVH_ALIGNMENT_MASK;
01112         nodeData += sizeToAdd;
01113 
01114         // Now serialize the subtree headers
01115         bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders.initializeFromBuffer(nodeData, bvh->m_subtreeHeaderCount, bvh->m_subtreeHeaderCount);
01116         if (i_swapEndian)
01117         {
01118                 for (int i = 0; i < bvh->m_subtreeHeaderCount; i++)
01119                 {
01120                         bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[0] = b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[0]);
01121                         bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[1] = b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[1]);
01122                         bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[2] = b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[2]);
01123 
01124                         bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[0] = b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[0]);
01125                         bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[1] = b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[1]);
01126                         bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[2] = b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[2]);
01127 
01128                         bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_rootNodeIndex = static_cast<int>(b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_rootNodeIndex));
01129                         bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_subtreeSize = static_cast<int>(b3SwapEndian(bvh->m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_subtreeSize));
01130                 }
01131         }
01132 
01133         return bvh;
01134 }

01140 m_bvhQuantization(self.m_bvhQuantization),
01141 m_bulletVersion(B3_BULLET_VERSION)

01146 void b3QuantizedBvh::deSerializeFloat(struct b3QuantizedBvhFloatData& quantizedBvhFloatData)
01147 {
01148         m_bvhAabbMax.deSerializeFloat(quantizedBvhFloatData.m_bvhAabbMax);
01149         m_bvhAabbMin.deSerializeFloat(quantizedBvhFloatData.m_bvhAabbMin);
01150         m_bvhQuantization.deSerializeFloat(quantizedBvhFloatData.m_bvhQuantization);
01151 
01152         m_curNodeIndex = quantizedBvhFloatData.m_curNodeIndex;
01153         m_useQuantization = quantizedBvhFloatData.m_useQuantization!=0;
01154         
01155         {
01156                 int numElem = quantizedBvhFloatData.m_numContiguousLeafNodes;
01157                 m_contiguousNodes.resize(numElem);
01158 
01159                 if (numElem)
01160                 {
01161                         b3OptimizedBvhNodeFloatData* memPtr = quantizedBvhFloatData.m_contiguousNodesPtr;
01162 
01163                         for (int i=0;i<numElem;i++,memPtr++)
01164                         {
01165                                 m_contiguousNodes[i].m_aabbMaxOrg.deSerializeFloat(memPtr->m_aabbMaxOrg);
01166                                 m_contiguousNodes[i].m_aabbMinOrg.deSerializeFloat(memPtr->m_aabbMinOrg);
01167                                 m_contiguousNodes[i].m_escapeIndex = memPtr->m_escapeIndex;
01168                                 m_contiguousNodes[i].m_subPart = memPtr->m_subPart;
01169                                 m_contiguousNodes[i].m_triangleIndex = memPtr->m_triangleIndex;
01170                         }
01171                 }
01172         }
01173 
01174         {
01175                 int numElem = quantizedBvhFloatData.m_numQuantizedContiguousNodes;
01176                 m_quantizedContiguousNodes.resize(numElem);
01177                 
01178                 if (numElem)
01179                 {
01180                         b3QuantizedBvhNodeData* memPtr = quantizedBvhFloatData.m_quantizedContiguousNodesPtr;
01181                         for (int i=0;i<numElem;i++,memPtr++)
01182                         {
01183                                 m_quantizedContiguousNodes[i].m_escapeIndexOrTriangleIndex = memPtr->m_escapeIndexOrTriangleIndex;
01184                                 m_quantizedContiguousNodes[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[0] = memPtr->m_quantizedAabbMax[0];
01185                                 m_quantizedContiguousNodes[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[1] = memPtr->m_quantizedAabbMax[1];
01186                                 m_quantizedContiguousNodes[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[2] = memPtr->m_quantizedAabbMax[2];
01187                                 m_quantizedContiguousNodes[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[0] = memPtr->m_quantizedAabbMin[0];
01188                                 m_quantizedContiguousNodes[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[1] = memPtr->m_quantizedAabbMin[1];
01189                                 m_quantizedContiguousNodes[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[2] = memPtr->m_quantizedAabbMin[2];
01190                         }
01191                 }
01192         }
01193 
01194         m_traversalMode = b3TraversalMode(quantizedBvhFloatData.m_traversalMode);
01195         
01196         {
01197                 int numElem = quantizedBvhFloatData.m_numSubtreeHeaders;
01198                 m_SubtreeHeaders.resize(numElem);
01199                 if (numElem)
01200                 {
01201                         b3BvhSubtreeInfoData* memPtr = quantizedBvhFloatData.m_subTreeInfoPtr;
01202                         for (int i=0;i<numElem;i++,memPtr++)
01203                         {
01204                                 m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[0] = memPtr->m_quantizedAabbMax[0] ;
01205                                 m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[1] = memPtr->m_quantizedAabbMax[1];
01206                                 m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMax[2] = memPtr->m_quantizedAabbMax[2];
01207                                 m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[0] = memPtr->m_quantizedAabbMin[0];
01208                                 m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[1] = memPtr->m_quantizedAabbMin[1];
01209                                 m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_quantizedAabbMin[2] = memPtr->m_quantizedAabbMin[2];
01210                                 m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_rootNodeIndex = memPtr->m_rootNodeIndex;
01211                                 m_SubtreeHeaders[i].m_subtreeSize = memPtr->m_subtreeSize;
01212                         }
01213                 }
01214         }
01215 }
